name: A Maze of Hope
description:
This is the third prototype assignment for JCCC GAME 136.  The assignment theme was "Hope" with the mechanics and style left open.  I chose to create an exploration style game in which one starts alone in a cold, dark, and colorless place with the goal of finding the cherry orchard that you love so much.

There are many things to discover as you explore, even if you go the wrong way.  Prayer lanterns are dotted throughout at which you can pray and receive a small pearl of wisdom and insight.  

As you get closer to the orchard, the sun climbs higher in the sky and becomes brighter.  Can you find your way through the long, winding mazes to rejoin your friends in the warm, bright, and peaceful orchard?  Don't give up hope.  Persevere and you will succeed.
